vlive.korean: [아이스초코 vs 오므라이스 이게 이렇게 심각깜찍한 선택지였나] 도 초코고... [when was choosing ice chocolate vs fried rice wrapped in omelette so cute?] That's chocolate too... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 아 RGRG 음악에서 동작이 나오고 김유겸은 본새가 나고🕺 (YUGYEOM’s story of learning to dance)
vlive.english: [when was choosing ice chocolate vs fried rice wrapped in omelette so cute?] That's chocolate too...

vlive.korean: 그러니까 선택지를 좁혀보라 이 말이야 뭔 말인지 알지? I mean, narrow the options down. You know what I mean? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 너와 내가 키스한 이유 [연애미수] EP07 재미 있는 일이 생길 때마다 너에게 말해주고 싶었
vlive.english: I mean, narrow the options down. You know what I mean?

vlive.korean: [이건 선택지 없어요?] 이거는 사지선답 없어요? [No choices for this one?] We don't get to choose from 4 examples? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
vlive.english: [No choices for this one?] We don't get to choose from 4 examples?

vlive.korean: 내가 그 영화 많이 본 거 알고 어떻게 있었지, 선택지에? I was really surprised that they gave me such a choice. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나랑 취향이 똑같은 사람과 소개팅을 시작한다면?ㅣ [리얼하이로맨스S2] 프롤로그
vlive.english: I was really surprised that they gave me such a choice.

vlive.korean: [앞으로 일기장에 오늘의 기분 선택지는 딱 두 가지] 기분이 맛있어요?] [From now on, my feelings will be] You're feeling tasty? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 광배가 오늘 기분 맛있다니까 제 기분은 이미 미슐랭 705스타 찍은거죠🐹🎂🎉💖 (Hyewon’s birthday party with members)
vlive.english: [From now on, my feelings will be] You're feeling tasty?

examples.korean: Hawaii remains a popular choice for winter vacation travel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하와이는 여전히 겨울 휴가 여행지로 인기 있는 선택지이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hawaii remains a popular choice for winter vacation travel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A painless childbirth is the only option for me because I have panthophobia. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 고통 공포증이 있는 나에게 무통 분만은 유일한 선택지이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: A painless childbirth is the only option for me because I have panthophobia. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was spoilt for choice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선택지가 너무 많아서 고르기가 어려웠다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was spoilt for choice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Spoilt for choice, he found out something. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선택지(肢)가 너무 많아 선택이 어려워진 그는 무언가를 발견했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Spoilt for choice, he found out something. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As much as the competition may bring about more favorable choices for consumers, there are concerns over the overheated competition. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경쟁이 고객들에게 더욱 호의적인 선택지를 제공하는 만큼, 과열된 경쟁에 대한 우려들도 있다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: As much as the competition may bring about more favorable choices for consumers, there are concerns over the overheated competition. Add to Wordbook
